src_original: evaṃ mayā śrutam |  ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ || [1]
tgt_original: 如是我聞。一時薄伽梵。在舍衛國祇樹給孤 獨園。與大苾芻僧。千二百五十人大菩薩摩 俱同會坐。

src_original: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
tgt_original: 爾時世尊。 告曼殊室利童子。

src_original: asti mañjuśrīrupariṣṭāyāmaparimitaguṇasaṃcayo nāma lokadhātustatrāparimitāyu[r]jñānasuviniścitatejorāja nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayati | [2]
tgt_original: 曼殊上方有世界。 名無量功德聚。 彼土有佛。 號無量智決定王如來。 阿耨多羅三藐三菩提現為眾生開示說法。

src_original: śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta,  ime jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā alpāyuṣkā varṣaśatāyuṣas;
tgt_original: 曼殊諦聽。 南門浮提人皆短壽。 大限百年。

src_original: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvāstasyāparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇavarṇaparikīrtana nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheyamātramapi śroṣyanti yāvat pustakāgatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti puṣpa-dhūpa-gandha-mālya-vilepana-cūrṇa-cīvara-cchatra-dhvaja-ghaṇṭā-patākābhiśca samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti te parikṣināyuṣaḥ punareva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti |
tgt_original: 曼殊如是無量壽如來功德名稱法要。
